mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.begintime AS "begintime", a.endtime AS "endtime", a.name AS "name", a.source AS "source", a.programvolumeid AS "programvolumeid", a.liveid AS "liveid", a.classroomid AS "classroomid", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_record( id, begintime, endtime, name, source, programvolumeid, liveid, classroomid, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( default, #{begintime}, #{endtime}, #{name}, #{source}, #{programvolumeid}, #{liveid}, #{classroomid}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_record SET begintime = #{begintime}, endtime = #{endtime}, name = #{name}, source = #{source}, programvolumeid = #{programvolumeid}, liveid = #{liveid}, classroomid = #{classroomid}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
